original_title: Fifteen Sri Lanka money changes lose licenses
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s central bank said licenses for 15 money changers will not be renewed for 2023, due to “due to the non-compliance with a condition” in 2022.

Sri Lanka’s central bank triggered the worst currency crisis in its history after cutting rates with printed money from early 2020 and cancelled one license in 2022 for buying dollar notes at high rates from the public.
